resources.string:
Welcome to Bonanza Sweet Adventures!
How to Play: 1. Objective: Your goal is to match and collect delicious candies to complete the level objectives. 2. Match Candies: Swap adjacent candies to make a line of three or more candies of the same type. 3. Level Objectives: Each level has different objectives. Complete them within the given number of moves to progress. 4. Special Candies: Create special candies by matching four or more candies. These powerful candies can help you clear obstacles and achieve your goals. 5. Boosters: Use boosters strategically to overcome challenging levels. They can be earned or purchased to give you an extra advantage.
Settings: 1. Sound and Music: Adjust the volume or mute the sound effects and music to your preference. 2. Notifications: Enable or disable game notifications to stay updated on events and special offers.
Contact Us: If you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance, please email our support team at support@bonanzasweetadventures.com. We\'re here to help!
Enjoy your delicious adventure in Bonanza Sweet Adventures!
